property.caption: Target class
property.description: The CSS class(ses) to be put on the element. Separate classes using a space

property.caption: Target hover class
property.description: The CSS class(ses) to be put on the element when an acceptable draggable is hovered over this widget. Separate classes using a space

property.caption: Target CSS selector
property.description: Optional, the selector to find the element to turn into a drop target. Leave empty to use the parent of the widget. This is a CSS selector, not a class.

property.caption: Accept CSS selector
property.description: Optional, a selector indicating which draggable elements are accepted. Leave empty to accept any draggable. This is a CSS selector, not a class.

property.caption: Droppable entities
property.description: Define the entities that may be dropped here. If you define an entity multiple times, each entry will be processed.

property.caption: On drop entity
property.description: The entity used for the drop, the widget creates an object of this entity at each drop. It is recommended to use a non-persistent entity.

property.caption: Dragged entity reference
property.description: The reference from the drop entity to the dragged entity. The widget will set this reference when an item is dropped.

property.caption: Drop target reference
property.description: The reference from the drop entity to the drop target entity. The widget will set this reference to the context object when an item is dropped.

property.caption: Microflow
property.description: The microflow to execute when an item is dropped.
